name: cccheng
body:
# Chung-Chiang Cheng #

### Education ###
* 2005-2007  M.S., Intelligent Media Lab, Dept. of Computer Science, National ChengChi University
* 2002-2005  B.S., Dept. of Computer Science, National ChengChi University
* 1998-2001  National Taichung First Senior High School
* 1995-1998  Taichung Municipal Da-De Junior High School
* 1989-1995  Taichung Municipal Ren Ai Elementary School

### Skill ###
* C, C++, Ruby, Shell script
* Linux kernel, Linux system

### Experience ###
* 2008.12 -

### Publication ###
* T.-Y. Li and C.C. Cheng, "Real-Time Camera Planning for Navigation in Virtual Environment," in Proceedings of the 8th International Symposium on Smart Graphics, Rennes, France, 2008.08. Lecture Notes in Computer Science 5166, . pp. 118-129.
* C.C. Cheng and T.-Y. Li, "Planning of Virtual Camera for Moving Objects in Computer Animation ," in Proceeding of 2005 Computer Graphics Workshop (CG2006), Taiwan, 2006.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
